dct_description_sm: Issued in: Géographie universelle, exposée dans les differentes méthodes qui peuvent abréger l’étude ..., Huitieme édition. -- A Paris: Chez Pierre-François Giffart, rue S. Jacques, à Sainte Thérèse, M. DCC. LIX (1759)
California with a rounded northern coast.
Includes bibliographical references (p. xv-xvi) and indexes.

In French. With title: MAPPE-MONDE “Page. 7.” (top left), “faure Sculp.” (bottom right); island of California unlabeled; Continents labeled as well as the I. Salomon, I. de Feu, Nzelande, and Diemens.
Glen McLaughlin with Nancy H. Mayo.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
